title: TIP-6: Adapt ongoing THALES distribution ratio between L1 and L2 SNX stakers dynamically
body:
https://gov.thales.io/docs/TIP-6

This TIP proposes to dynamically adapt the ratio of THALES rewards between ongoing L1 and L2 SNX stakers as to stay proportional to the L1 and L2 ratio of SNX inflation rewards.

Are you in favor of this proposal?
author: 0x11219d61e95fC5930762b16868dDB2C9c6fc83fA
